Description:
About this item
High-Speed Performance: Experience lightning-fast data transfer with the FA100 M.2 ssd 256GB, offering read speeds up to 3300 MB/s and write speeds up to 2700 MB/s. Ideal for laptop and desktop users seeking efficient and reliable storage solutions. Built with 3D NAND technology, the FA100 ensures durability and stability, making it a dependable 256GB ssd M.2 choice for users who demand consistent performance for gaming, work, or creative projects.
Comprehensive Data Security: FA100 supports ECC error correction based on 4K LDPC, S.M.A.R.T. and end-to-end data protection. This effectively reduces data errors that may occur during SSD read and write.
Ultra-low Power Consumption: FA100 NVMe M.2 PCIe 3.0 x4 SSD supports multiple technologies such as modern standby and ultra-low power consumption. After installation, it can effectively control the power consumption of your system and extend its battery life.
Efficient PCIe 3.0 Interface: Harness the power of the PCIe 3.0 M.2 ssd interface for improved data bandwidth and reduced latency. The FA100 offers a robust solution for users upgrading to a 256GB NVMe M.2 storage device.
